name: Fixed Expense Tracker with Monthly Total v3

parameters.query:
=INSERT INTO expenses (amount, category, description, phone_number) 
VALUES ( 
  {{ $json.amount }}, 
  '{{ $json.category }}', 
  '{{ $json.description }}', 
  '{{ $json.phone }}' 
) 
RETURNING *;

=SELECT 
  COALESCE(SUM(amount), 0) as total,
  COUNT(*) as count
FROM expenses 
WHERE EXTRACT(MONTH FROM date) = EXTRACT(MONTH FROM CURRENT_DATE)
  AND EXTRACT(YEAR FROM date) = EXTRACT(YEAR FROM CURRENT_DATE)
  AND phone_number = '{{ $('Parse Message').item.json.phone }}'
